EmailTemplate.subject: RECORDING LINK: Getting the Budget You Need By Proving Value and Return on Investment
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Thank you for your interest in our webinar! Getting the Budget You Need By Proving Value and Return on Investment (ROI)
Thank you for your interest in our complimentary webinar. The live Session was recorded on August 16, 2011.
You can review the recording at this link: http://tritech.ilinc.com/join/pphzpcc
For more information about TriTech Software Systems, email Sales@TriTech.com or visit www.TriTech.com.
The TriTechTeam
Share this message with colleagues or visit us at www.tritech.com
